Introduction
This topic contains information on reconsidering the status of a child deemed permanently incapable of self-support, including
consequences of the marriage of a child deemed permanently incapable of self-support
discontinuing an award due to marriage
restoring the award if the marriage is dissolved
, and
handling
subsequent findings of competency
, and
discontinuance of a surviving spouse’s entitlement
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section B - A Child’s Permanent Incapacity for Self-Support
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section B
